Vorpal chuckled evilly as lights aro=
und the chamber that housed the protoform began to flicker and glow. From i=
nside Skorponok the chambers that held Cyclonus, Rodimus and Scourge began =
to glow as well. Cables snaked out from the building that held the protofor=
m and connected with Scorponok and all the chambers began to glow. 

"You w=
ill see soon enough my minions. Soon the final peice of this new being will=
 arrive and all will be in readiness."

Perceptor is clearly able to hear a=
nd see what is going on . . . well I do not know how good Percpetor's visio=
n is, but the average bot could clearly see. The room that all this is taki=
ng place=A0in is huge with a startlingly high cieling. The building that Sk=
orponok is standing next to is nearly center of this chmaber. The floor nea=
r the building is flat and featureless, but as you look near the walls the =
floor gets progressivly rougher and debris strewn. Sounds echo easilly abou=
t this place, and any sound can be heard. 

A=A0few=A0constructor-drones mo=
ve about the place digging and shoring up walls. A few of these drones are =
moving in Perceptor's direction. It is clear from thier stance they are not=
 yet aware of him.
